t: Monsanto - Wikipedia

t: Monsanto | History, Products, Acquisition, & Facts | Britannica Money
s: The company was incorporated as the Monsanto Chemical Company in 1933. Its production of styrene, a component of synthetic rubber, was vital to the U.S. war effort during World War II. Reflecting its diverse product offerings, the company changed its name to Monsanto Company in 1964.
